department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 磁流體力學在太空、天文與電漿及數學領域有重要之應用。本課程之目標為建立學生具備磁流體力學理論之深厚基礎，並能應用於描述及理解太空環境之大尺度電漿現象，如震波與不穩定性等。除傳授重要的物理概念與數學方法，本課程採循序漸進與深入淺出之方式，引導同學的學習興趣，並啟發同學的思考能力。在修讀一學期之磁流體力學課程後，同學對於核心概念及主題，如磁通量凍結、磁流體波及震波、磁流體系統的平衡及穩定性等均能建立深度及廣度之物理及數學基礎。
goal.en: “Magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) has important applications in the area of space、astrophysical、plasma physics and mathematics. The objective of this course is to establish students’ in-depth foundation in MHD theory and enable them to apply the knowledge to understand the large-scale plasma phenomena occurring in space environment such as shock waves and plasma instabilities etc.  Important physical concepts and mathematical methods are conducted step-by-step and in a comprehensive manner to guide students’ self-motivation and ability to think.  After taking one-semester course, the students are expected to have established core physical concepts and equipped with methodologies in various topics of MHD theory including frozen-in-flux、MHD waves and shocks、MHD equilibrium and instability etc.“

outline.ch: 簡介、磁性流體基本方法與概念、磁流體波與震波、磁流體平衡與不穩定性、壓力非均向磁流體力學等。
outline.en: Introduction、MHD equations and basic concepts、MHD waves、MHD shocks、MHD equilibrium、MHD instability、Anisotropic MHD etc.
